subject: Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Every Olympics has its local casualties, and some Russian towns have fared better than others. Akhshtyr, a barren mountain village near Sochi, has fared very badly indeed.
snippet: Every Olympics has its local casualties, and some Russian towns have fared better than others. Akhshtyr, a barren mountain village near Sochi, has fared very badly indeed.
